artefact.overview: Cancel your practical driving test if you no longer need your appointment
artefact.more_information:
You’ll need 2 of the following:

- Great Britain or Northern Ireland driving licence number
- application reference number
- theory test pass certificate number

You can [find your theory test pass certificate number](/find-your-lost-theory-test-pass-certificate-number "Find your lost theory test pass certificate number") online if you have lost your original letter.

% You'll get a full refund if you give at least 3 clear working days’ notice. Sundays and public holidays don’t count as working days. %

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 - fair processing notice for DSA](/dsa-driving-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 - fair processing notice for DSA") before you start.
artefact.introduction: Cancel your practical driving test if you no longer need your appointment. You can do it online between 6am and 11:40pm.
artefact.alternate_methods:
##Cancel by phone

You can cancel your test by calling the Driving Standards Agency (DSA).

$C

**DSA practical test bookings and enquiries**

**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1166  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

$C

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency

artefact.title: Driving tests and learning to drive

details.description: Includes booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
